name: Brussels Sprouts and Apple Salad with Parmesan
description: This crunchy sweet salad is perfectly balanced with salty Parmesan cheese for a satisfying bite. Serve this up with your favorite protein or have it as a side salad this Autumn - it's a great way to use up those apple picking apples!
recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup chopped raw almonds (for extra flavor, toast these first)

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, whisk together the olive oil, apple cider vinegar, honey, and season with salt and pepper. Add the brussels sprouts and apples and toss well. Let sit in the refrigerator for at least 15-20 minutes and then take out and fold in the almonds and half of the Parmesan cheese. Transfer to a serving bowl or plate and top with remaining Parmesan.
